name: The Silent Patient
title: A famous painter shoots her husband and then stops speaking. A psychotherapist is determined to uncover her motive.

name: Atomic Habits
title: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones with small changes that lead to significant results.

name: Educated
title: A woman who grows up in a strict, abusive household in rural Idaho decides to leave and pursue education.

name: Dune
title: A desert planet, a young noble, and a spice that holds the key to the universe's most valuable resource..

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
title: A story of a mysterious wild girl living in a marsh and a murder investigation that turns the town against her.

name: Becoming
title: Michelle Obama’s journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House.

name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
title: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by focusing on what's truly important.

name: The Alchemist
title: A young shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend and find treasure.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
title: A narrative that explores the history of human evolution, from ancient species to modern society.

name: The Night Circus
title: A magical competition between two young illusionists who become entwined in a mystical circus.

name: The Power of Now
title: A guide to spiritual enlightenment through living in the present moment.

name: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
title: The story of a woman whose cancer cells revolutionized medical research.

name: Gone Girl
title: A wife goes missing, and her husband becomes the prime suspect in a suspenseful psychological thriller.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
title: A look into the two systems that drive the way we think—one fast and intuitive, the other slow and deliberate.

name: Little Fires Everywhere
title: A perfect suburban town is rocked by the arrival of a single mother and her daughter.
